The correct answer is A: [00:01:39 - 00:02:36]. 

In this segment, Kevin is shown setting up a green tarp shelter while explaining his ridgeline method. He mentions that he prefers a ridgeline over trekking poles and discusses the placement of three pegs to secure the shelter. The on-screen model/size text provides additional context about the size of the tarp.

The correct answer is C: [00:04:46 - 00:05:54]. 

We can hear ferry sounds and crunching snow in the background between 00:04:46 and 00:05:54. According to the transcription, Kevin appears on or near the ferry at this point in time. Therefore, option C is the correct answer.
